specialBuffDetails.name: Tether
specialBuffDetails.description: Decreases chance to dodge by 10% and damage dealt by 5%. Every action removes one stack of Tether.

skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: 3 x 110% (330%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether and Wound.
1 x 130% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.
2 x 75% (150%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.
2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.
2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, applies 2 stacks of Tether.
8 x 75% (600%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether and Blind.
Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Tether. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)
5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether.
5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Tether.
6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Tether.
When this Monster gets attacked, apply a stack of Tether on the attacker.
2 x 115% (230%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.
2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies 2 stacks of Tether.
